message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually agreeable arrangement.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it provides. I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This reflects the product's true worth.
